metadata.title: CVE-2021-47294 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netrom: Decrease sock refcount when sock timers expireCommit 63346650c1a9 ("netrom: switch to sock timer API") switched to usesock timer API. It replaces mod_timer() by sk_reset_timer(), anddel_timer() by sk_stop_timer().Function sk_reset_timer() will increase the refcount of sock if it iscalled on an inactive timer, hence, in case the timer expires, we need todecrease the refcount ourselves in the handler, otherwise, the sockrefcount will be unbalanced and the sock will never be freed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
